edge: A movie is represented by its summary, which provides a brief overview of the plot and key events.

Makdee is actually a conwoman who is looking for a hidden treasure in the village.
Makdee abducts many children to dig up the place where the hidden treasure is located.
Two policemen accompany Makdee in her plan of finding the hidden treasure.
Kallu enters Makdee's mansion looking for the children who have been abducted by her.
Makdee traps all the people, including the policemen, in an attempt to flee the village with the children.
Kallu confronts Makdee when she finds her trapped by Chunni.
The kids and other people beat up the policemen for their notoriety and help Chunni stop Makdee.
